article_title: Out2Enroll health insurance push aims for LGBT coverage
article_text: After decades of stigma and discrimination, Out2Enroll works to let North Carolina’s lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people know they can get covered through the Affordable Care Act exchange.

article_metadata.news-keywords: LGBT, health insurance, discrimination, affordable, care, act, ACA, Obamacare, Out2Enroll, transgender, gay, lesbian, bisexual, HIV
